sentences.en: Don't you think the saxophone a sexy instrument?
sentences.cn: 你不觉得萨克斯风是个很性感的乐器 吗 ?

sentences.en: George is mad about his new saxophone.
sentences.cn: 乔治对他的新萨克斯风爱不释手.

sentences.en: Going Back Home is a famous piece of saxophone music.
sentences.cn: 《回家》是一首著名的萨克斯管乐曲.

sentences.en: He couldn't play saxophone but hoot, which set us laughing.
sentences.cn: 他根本不会吹萨克斯管,只吹出“嘟嘟”的声音, 把我们大家逗得哈哈大笑.

sentences.en: He started his career in show business by playing the saxophone and singing.
sentences.cn: 他的演艺生涯是从吹奏萨克斯和唱歌开始的。

sentences.en: He took a saxophone from the Salvation Army but was caught and had to hand it back.
sentences.cn: 他从救世军那里拿了一支萨克斯管，但却被抓住了，只得将其交还。

sentences.en: He was jamming with his saxophone.
sentences.cn: 他在即兴吹奏萨克斯管。
他把自己的萨克斯管作为抵押.

sentences.en: I build on what the piano proclaimed , or disagree with the saxophone.
sentences.cn: 我可以信赖钢琴的观点, 也可以和萨克斯管争执.

sentences.en: I love the saxophone solo on this song.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢萨克斯管独奏这首歌.

sentences.en: I wish I had his saxophone's soft leather traveling bag with me, so I could give it to this man in case he someday finds himself on the way to a non-street gig.
sentences.cn: 我真希望我当时带着他那只装萨克斯的软皮旅行包，这样我就可以把包送给这个人，好让某天他结束街头艺人生涯，开始正式演出时可以用得上。

sentences.en: Larry can play many musical instruments, including the violin and saxophone.
sentences.cn: 拉里可以弹奏许多种乐器, 包括小提琴和萨克斯风.

sentences.en: Last not least he plays the saxophone.
sentences.cn: 此外他最后还演奏了萨克斯.

sentences.en: Please show me that saxophone on the shelf.
sentences.cn: 请把架子上的那个萨克斯管给我看看.

sentences.en: Saxophone is the devil's horn that has become God's voice.
sentences.cn: 萨克斯是魔鬼的乐器,却发出了上帝的声音.

sentences.en: That evening, Bill and Hillary were getting ready for bed. Hillary turned to Bill and said, "Well, I found out who peed in your saxophone.
sentences.cn: 当晚，比尔和希拉里正要睡觉，希拉里转过身来跟比尔说道：“哎呀，我知道是谁往你的萨克斯管里撒尿了。”

sentences.en: The inventor of the saxophone, Adolphe Sax also hails from Belgium.
sentences.cn: 发明萨克斯风的阿道夫.萨克斯也是比利时人.
那钢琴演奏者兼作萨克斯管吹奏员。

trans.tran_en: a curved musical instrument made of metal that you play by blowing into it and pressing buttons, used especially in popular music and  jazz
